name: Heal Palestine
mission: Sheltering Program provides immediate, practical protection for families who have nowhere else to go.
theoryOfChange: Healing happens through four pillars (Health, Aid, Education, Leadership) to provide both urgent lifesaving care and sustainable long-term career and health outcomes.

components.evidence: Explicit zakat program (+4); Muslim-focused organization (+2); Asnaf: ibn_sabil (+5); Operates in Muslim-majority regions (+3); Strong humanitarian service (+4)
components.name: Muslim Donor Fit

alignment.rationale: Alignment 38/50: HIGH Muslim donor fit, humanitarian cause area

components.improvement_suggestion: Build working capital reserves to 1-3 months of operating expenses
components.name: Financial Health

components.improvement_suggestion: Seek external evaluation or track outcomes for 3+ years
components.name: Evidence & Outcomes

components.improvement_suggestion: Document a clear theory of change with causal pathway
components.name: Theory of Change

score_details.score_summary: HEAL Palestine Inc. earns 63/100 due to strong alignment and moderate impact, with zakat compliance.

zakat.claim_evidence: HEAL Palestine is a Zakat-certified nonprofit dedicated to providing essential medical care, education, and humanitarian aid to families in need. This Ramadan, your Zakat can make a life-changing impact, offering hope and relief to those facing immense hardships. At HEAL Palestine, we ensure that 100% of Zakat contributions are distributed to eligible recipients with full transparency and accountability. Every dollar of your Zakat is used for direct aid—providing healthcare, food, and emergency relief to those who need it most. (Source: https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/grounding-api-redirect/AUZIYQGtBOGlLqDZtyc3V558Q56GsrJ3GPYJwvDfadXkSR52wpkyZobav-TeEZTsQmQ-bXl07rT90mhqShF1LVGRs1vNy_WDvBUyhbkJQodaEAbQFWvDfk4qnZ8TFnnGXvT5XE3h_JBsVtYTEqroEN7mwUlK-0-YTwnSJyyh-n0_9Z4=)

all_citations.claim: The charity holds 17.8 months of working capital and focuses on direct humanitarian services.
Total revenue is $20,223,260 with a program expense ratio of 88.2%.
The organization offers Zakat-eligible donation options for its sheltering and food programs.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The score of 63/100 reflects a balance between exceptional financial efficiency and the high-cost nature of providing direct humanitarian aid in a conflict zone. While the organization shows strong alignment with donor needs, its impact score is moderated by the significant resources required per beneficiary.
areas_for_improvement: Impact score reflects the high cost per beneficiary inherent in direct humanitarian service delivery.
Limited long-term historical data available due to the organization's focus on immediate crisis response.

dimension_explanations.alignment: HEAL Palestine shows high alignment for donors seeking urgent humanitarian intervention, particularly as a Zakat-eligible entity [3]. The organization demonstrates a strong track record of fiscal responsibility, maintaining 17.8 months of working capital to ensure operational continuity during crises [1][2].
dimension_explanations.impact: The organization maintains a program expense ratio of 88.2%, directing most of its $20,223,260 in revenue toward direct services like sheltering and food distribution [2]. While the cost per beneficiary is calculated at 719.9322, this reflects the intensive nature of providing life-saving aid in high-urgency environments [1].

baseline_narrative.headline: HEAL Palestine Inc. provides urgent humanitarian relief and sheltering for families in Gaza through a highly efficient financial model.
strengths: High program expense ratio of 88.2% ensures the vast majority of funds reach those in need.
Exceptional fundraising efficiency with a cost of only $0.01 per $1 raised.
Strong financial stability with 17.8 months of working capital available.
Zakat-eligible status allows for specific religious giving compliance.
baseline_narrative.summary: HEAL Palestine Inc. is a humanitarian organization dedicated to providing immediate protection and aid to families who have lost their homes, operating with a total revenue of $20,223,260 [2]. The charity focuses on direct relief through its sheltering program, bakery initiatives, and food parcel distribution to address critical survival needs [1][3].

rich_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The score of 63/100 reflects a balance between exceptional financial efficiency and the high-cost nature of providing direct humanitarian aid in a conflict zone. While the organization shows strong alignment with donor needs, its impact score is moderated by the significant resources required per beneficiary.

areas_for_improvement.context: As the organization was <cite id="2">founded in 2024</cite>, it lacks the multi-year financial history typically sought by institutional evaluators.
The nature of direct humanitarian relief in conflict zones results in a <cite id="14">cost of $719.93 per beneficiary</cite>, which is higher than preventative or long-term development models.

bbb_assessment.summary: This organization is too new for a full BBB Wise Giving Alliance assessment.

case_against.mitigation_notes: The high cost is mitigated by the <cite id="13">urgency of the humanitarian crisis</cite> and the direct nature of the aid provided.
risk_factors: <cite id="14">High cost per beneficiary ($719.93)</cite> compared to non-emergency humanitarian peers.
case_against.summary: The primary concern is the <cite id="2">recent founding date</cite>, which means long-term sustainability and outcome trends are not yet established.

confidence.notes: Strong transparency data from Candid/Charity Navigator despite short operating history.

alignment.explanation: The charity is a strong fit for Muslim donors, offering <cite id="10">zakat-eligible programs</cite> that serve <cite id="18">8 categories of asnaf</cite>.

credibility.explanation: Donors can trust this charity due to its <cite id="9">Platinum Seal of Transparency</cite> and <cite id="15">independent board of 6 members</cite>.
credibility.improvement: To strengthen credibility, the charity could <cite id="16">document a clear theory of change</cite> with a detailed causal pathway for its long-term programs.

impact.explanation: Operations are highly direct, with <cite id="4">88.2% of expenses</cite> going to programs like <cite id="7">emergency sheltering</cite>.
impact.improvement: Impact measurement would benefit from <cite id="17">tracking outcomes for 3+ years</cite> to move beyond immediate relief statistics.

donor_fit_matrix.evidence_rigor: Grade C - Measured outcomes with limited history

grantmaking_profile.grant_strategy: Direct funding of relief operations and sheltering infrastructure in Gaza.

rich_narrative.headline: HEAL Palestine Inc. provides urgent humanitarian relief and sheltering for families in Gaza through a highly efficient financial model.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who prioritize immediate, life-saving humanitarian aid in Palestine and want to fulfill zakat obligations through a highly efficient, direct-service model.
donor_motivations: Want to provide direct sheltering and food to families in Gaza
Value high program expense ratios and low overhead
Seek to fulfill zakat through an organization serving multiple asnaf categories
Prioritize transparency and are comfortable with a newer organization
giving_considerations: Gifts support high-cost, high-urgency emergency interventions
The organization is in a growth phase with a limited historical track record
Operations are focused on high-conflict zones with significant access challenges
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking long-term academic research or those who prefer established organizations with decades of historical financial data.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: Grade C reflects that outcomes are <cite id="13">actively tracked (8 metrics)</cite>, but the organization has not yet undergone external evaluation.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: The organization provides immediate shelter and food to stabilize families, preventing further displacement and mortality.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Evidence ensures that emergency aid effectively reaches the most vulnerable without duplication or waste.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: The massive scale of the humanitarian crisis in Palestine exceeds current funding levels.

peer_comparison.differentiator: Distinguished by an <cite id="5">unusually low fundraising cost of 1%</cite> compared to larger international peers.

strengths.detail: The charity maintains a <cite id="4">program expense ratio of 88.2%</cite>, which significantly exceeds the <cite id="11">industry standard of 75%</cite>.
HEAL Palestine spends only <cite id="5">$0.01 to raise every $1</cite>, maximizing the impact of donor contributions.
The organization holds <cite id="12">17.8 months of working capital</cite>, providing a robust buffer for emergency operations.

strengths_deep_dive: HEAL Palestine's operational model is built for rapid response in high-conflict zones. By maintaining <cite id="12">17.8 months of operating reserves</cite>, the charity ensures it can continue its <cite id="7">sheltering and food programs</cite> even during periods of funding volatility. Their <cite id="9">Platinum Candid status</cite> reflects a commitment to sharing <cite id="13">8 distinct outcome metrics</cite>, which is rare for such a young organization founded in <cite id="2">2024</cite>.
rich_narrative.summary: HEAL Palestine Inc. is a humanitarian organization dedicated to providing immediate protection and aid to families in crisis, operating with a <cite id="1">total revenue of $20,223,260</cite>. Founded in <cite id="2">2024</cite>, the charity focuses on direct relief through its sheltering program, bakery initiatives, and food parcel distribution to address critical survival needs in the <cite id="3">Gaza Strip and West Bank</cite>. The organization maintains a highly efficient financial model, dedicating a <cite id="4">program expense ratio of 88.2%</cite> to direct services. This efficiency is further highlighted by its <cite id="5">fundraising efficiency of $0.01 per $1 raised</cite>, ensuring that nearly every dollar donated goes directly toward humanitarian aid. HEAL Palestine's programs are diverse, covering <cite id="6">health, aid, education, leadership, and orphan support</cite>, with a specific emphasis on <cite id="7">sheltering families who have nowhere else to go</cite>. Despite its recent founding, the organization has demonstrated significant operational capacity, distributing <cite id="8">$1,339,352 in foreign grants</cite> to support local relief efforts. The charity's commitment to transparency is evidenced by its <cite id="9">Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid</cite>, the highest level of recognition for non-profit disclosure. For Muslim donors, the organization provides a <cite id="10">verified zakat-eligible giving pathway</cite>, serving multiple categories of asnaf including the poor, needy, and wayfarers.
